title: wth riot
body: why is it that after the snowdown the game keeps glitching ..... i mean i have 90-120 fps and 49 ms ... but the game is responding like i have 15 fps at max. Why is that ?

replies.body: Could be some game files struggling to render with that mode's assets.  See if a force repatch with the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) or repair can help fix things up!
